Deleting 5.3/6.0 Folders

When you delete a 5.3/6.0 folder using the current version of Serena ChangeMan Version Manager, Version Manager deletes the folder and the versioned files contained within it. The archives and workfiles associated with the deleted versioned files are not removed. The changes you make to the project root structure by deleting folders using the current edition of Version Manager are also visible when working with Version Manager 5.3/6.0.

Note: To restore versioned files that were deleted, import the archives.

To delete a folder:

  1. Select the folder you want to delete from the Project pane.

  2. Select File | Delete.

Note: Depending on how you've set up your Version Manager environment, a dialog box may ask for confirmation to delete the folder. Click Yes to confirm the delete or No to cancel.
